attributes.action: Government to support UKs hospitality industry through the coronavirus crisis
attributes.additional_details: Many of the businesses are family-owned and rely on the local community for their livelihood. Likewise, many restaurants and bars will be unable to pay their staff through prolonged periods of self-isolation and social distancing which will have a knock-on effect to people financially during the coronavirus.
attributes.background: Offer monetary support to hospitality business owners and their staff throughout the coronavirus pandemic. From local restaurants and bars to the wait and kitchen staff that will be affected by the near-forced closure of businesses up and down the country.
